bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXXXIII (Nos 5344-5403)
bibl.seg: P.J. Parsons & N. Gonis, with contributions by W.E.H. Cockle, D. Colomo, W.B. Henry, M. Hirt, A. Koenig, D. Lincicum, D. Obbink, D.W. Rathbone, M. Reinfelder, J.D. Thomas, H. Whitehouse, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXXXIII (Nos 5344-5403) = Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 104.
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 2018, xii-230 pp., figg., 22 pll. ISBN 978-0-85698-231-6. Â£85.

P. Oxy. LXXXIII, 5344-5403. - P. v: Preface (P.J.P. & N.G.). - I. Theological Texts (5344-5348). - II. New Literary & Subliterary Texts (5349-5359). - III. Documentary Texts (5360-5400) [including documents from the dossier of the 'Apion family', 5365-5400]. - IV. Painting & Drawings (5401-5403).
C.R. par J.K. Elliott, JThS 70 (2019) pp. 386-388.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXXXIII, 5344-5403. - P. v: Preface (P.J.P. & N.G.). - I. Theological Texts (5344-5348). - II. New Literary & Subliterary Texts (5349-5359). - III. Documentary Texts (5360-5400) [including documents from the dossier of the 'Apion family', 5365-5400]. - IV. Painting & Drawings (5401-5403).
